page.title: 13ASHDON GOLDSTONES FARM CONT.
page.content: Mr.Furze uses all kinds of spray, such as (roundup),(dicurane) and he uses tilt as a general fungicide.The weather has not been kind to the farmer this year,rain has flattened a lot of his cereal crops.Mr.Furze has 450 Large White and Welsh pigs some of which are sold for bacon and meat.The pigs are fed on wheat, barley,fish meal,soya beans and minerals that are mixed together and made into pellets.About 15 to 20 pigs are taken to market every Tuesday. The main machinery at Goldstones farm includes 10 tractors,2 combines,1 beet harvester,2 corn drills,2 fertiliser spreaders,and 1 manure spreader.Apart from Mr Furze and his son there are 5 full time and 2 part time workers.In conclusion,Mr.Furze considers that farming in Ashdon is easier these days but more complicated
